name: Fist Puncher: Old School Beat 'Em Up
blurb: A team of vigilantes led by neurosurgeon & black belt Dr. Karate perform unnecessary surgery on the crimelords of a lawless city.
ksr_blurb: <p>Do you miss classic 8-bit video games? No worries, as brothers Jake and Matt Lewandowski are coming to the rescue with <i>Fist Puncher</i>, a new retro-style, side scrolling RPG that will make you feel like you are still living in the era of <i>Double Dragon</i>.\u00a0</p>

rewards.reward: A digital thank you card from us along with your name in the game credits on our website. Plus our eternal gratitude.
Digital download of the PC version of Washington's Wig, the game that won IGN\u2019s The Next Game Boss. Plus previous reward tier.

The Fist Puncher Indie Bundle! \r\nDigital downloads of the PC versions of Washington's Wig and Fist Puncher. Plus 3 Fist Puncher trading cards (Add $5 for international shipping).  Plus previous reward tiers.

Deluxe Fist Puncher Indie Bundle!! \r\nDigital downloads of Washington\u2019s Wig and Fist Puncher, PLUS: Fist Puncher and Washington\u2019s Wig MP3 soundtracks; 3 ringtones, 3 desktop backgrounds and 5 sprite sheets from Fist Puncher and Washington\u2019s Wig.  Plus all previous reward tiers (Add $5 for international shipping).

VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle!!!  Digital download of the behind-the-scenes making of Fist Puncher documentary and a digital download of the Fist Puncher pre-release for beta testing.  Give us feedback and help us improve Fist Puncher before its release and receive an in-game tester credit.  Plus the Deluxe Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

Fist Puncher In-Game Signage.  We\u2019ll create a unique, personalized sign (billboard, poster or store front) that will appear in the Fist Puncher game. We\u2019ll send you a questionnaire to guarantee that the signage is personal and specific to you. \r\nPlus the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

Fist Puncher Non-Playable Character Based on YOU.  We\u2019ll create an NPC in Fist Puncher based on you, and you'll have one line of text dialog. This is pixel art, so we can't promise to capture every freckle, but by providing us with a picture of yourself and filling out a brief questionnaire, we\u2019ll add a version of you to the game.\r\nPlus the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

Fist Puncher Enemy Character Based on YOU.  Ever wanted to beat the stuffing out of yourself in a videogame? You'll have one line of text dialog before engaging in combat with the playable characters. Provide us with a picture of yourself, fill out a brief questionnaire, and we\u2019ll do the rest.\r\nPlus the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

Fist Puncher Boss Character Based on YOU. \r\nYour Boss Character will be the final, lead villain on a level and must be defeated to finish the stage. Provide us with a picture of yourself and fill out a brief questionnaire, and we\u2019ll turn you into an 8-bit badass. Plus the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

Fist Puncher Playable Character based on YOU.  Always wanted to star in a videogame? We\u2019ll create a playable character in Fist Puncher modeled after YOU! You\u2019ll be able to smash bad guys, throw smart cars, collect junk food power-ups, and play through the entire game as yourself. Provide us with a picture and fill out a brief questionnaire, and we'll make it happen.\r\nPlus the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

YOUR BAND on stage performing YOUR SONG in Fist Puncher.  Send us a picture of your band and an MP3 version of one of your songs and we\u2019ll add a pixel art version of you in the game. Whether you're taking the stage in a seedy roadside bar or DJing in an exclusive club, you'll provide the entertainment while all hell breaks loose around you.  Plus the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

A weekend playing and developing games with us on California's beautiful central coast!\r\nHang out with us while we work on Fist Puncher, bust out our massive classic game collection, and show you around the beautiful Santa Cruz area. Matt likes to bowl and sing karaoke, Jake enjoys playing with his dogs and roughing it in his mountain retreat. You'll be responsible for getting here, but we'll put you up in a nice hotel and take good care of you during your stay.  Plus a playable character in the game and the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).

Hire us to develop a game from YOUR vision!\r\nTell us your game idea and we'll turn it into a playable game in our offbeat 8-bit style. Obviously we'll have to agree on a managable scope, but we're open to negotiation and we're very flexible. We aren't going to make Fallout 4 for you, but if you want to star in a platformer where the bosses are your exes, let's talk.  Plus the VIP Fist Puncher Indie Bundle (Add $5 for international shipping).
